title: Riding With Ghosts and Spirits - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/28/20
itunes:title: Riding With Ghosts and Spirits - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/28/20
description:
George Noory and psychic medium John Russell explore his psychic abilities that have allowed him to contact spirits on the other side since he was a child, and some of the scariest and most satisfying experiences he has had talking to the dead.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
